title: Decreased production costs shift supply right

content.question: In the short run, a decrease in production costs of a product will shift

choices.label: both the demand curve and the supply curve to the right
the demand curve to the left and the supply curve to the right
only the supply curve to the right
only the supply curve to the left
only the demand curve to the left

content.answer: only the supply curve to the right

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
